name: test_NAF_8_12_0_Upload_Thumbnail
description:
Test that an admin user can upload a video thumbnail.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Video section
4. Upload a new video with random title
5. Upload/Change thumbnail for the video
6. Verify thumbnail is successfully uploaded
descriptionHtml:
Test that an admin user can upload a video thumbnail.

Test Steps:

  1. Launch the browser
  2. Login as admin user
  3. Navigate to Video section
  4. Upload a new video with random title
  5. Upload/Change thumbnail for the video
  6. Verify thumbnail is successfully uploaded

Test Steps: 1. Launch the browser 2. Login as admin user 3. Navigate to Video section 4. Upload a new video with random title 5. Upload/Change thumbnail for the video 6. Verify thumbnail is successfully uploaded """) def test_NAF_8_12_0_Upload_Thumbnail(): with sync_playwright() as p: #Launch Browser browser = p.chromium.launch(headless=False, slow_mo=200) #headless=False page = browser.new_page() #Go to login login_page = LoginPage(page) login_page.loginDev(admin_user,admin_pw) #Go to Videos videos_page = VideosPage(page) assert videos_page.navigate_to_videos #Upload Video video_title = create_video_title() videos_page.upload_new_video(video_title) #Upload/Change Thumbnail > videos_page.upload_thumbnail(video_title)
